trans-unit.source: Hosts custom controls or Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: Hospeda controles personalizados ou controles de formulários do Windows.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripControlHost is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripControlHost é a classe base abstrata para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripControlHost can host other controls, including custom controls, in two ways: - Construct a ToolStripControlHost with a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripControlHost pode hospedar outros controles, incluindo controles personalizados, de duas maneiras:-criar um ToolStripControlHost com uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: To fully access the hosted control and properties, you must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A> property back to the actual class it represents.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar totalmente o controle hospedado e propriedades, você deve converter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>classe de propriedade para o valor real ele representa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Extend ToolStripControlHost, and in the inherited class's default constructor, call the base class constructor passing a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: -Estender ToolStripControlHost e no construtor de padrão da classe herdada, chame o construtor de classe base, passando uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: This option lets you wrap common control methods and properties for easy access in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Essa opção permite que você encapsule métodos comuns de controle e propriedades para facilitar o acesso em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripControlHost class to host your customized controls or any other Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe ToolStripControlHost para hospedar controles personalizados ou qualquer outro controle de formulários do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To customize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, derive from ToolStripControlHost and create a custom implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, derivam ToolStripControlHost e crie uma implementação personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: You can override methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A> to handle events raised by the hosted controls, and you can put custom functionality into properties to enhance the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir os métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>manipular eventos gerados pelos controles hospedados, e você pode colocar a funcionalidade personalizada em propriedades para aprimorar o controle hospedado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class that hosts the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> classe que hospeda o controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> hospedado por este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The control referred to by the c parameter is .
trans-unit.target: O controle à qual o c parâmetro é .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class that hosts the specified control and that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> classe que hospeda o controle especificado e que tem o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> hospedado por este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de plano de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de plano de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem de plano de fundo exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> que representa a imagem a ser exibida no plano de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ImageLayout" name="ImageLayout" href=""></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o layout de imagem de plano de fundo, conforme definido no <xref uid="langword_csharp_ImageLayout" name="ImageLayout" href=""> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>: - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (default) - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>
trans-unit.target: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>: - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (default) -<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle pode ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle pode ser selecionado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle hospedado causa e gera eventos de validação em outros controles, quando o controle hospedado recebe o foco.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle hospedado causa e gera eventos de validação em outros controles, quando o controle hospedado recebe foco; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> hospeda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> hospeda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the control on the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento do controle no formulário.

trans-unit.source: Use the ControlAlign property to determine or define how hosted controls are to be laid out on the form.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ControlAlign para determinar ou definir como hospedados controles são dispostos no formulário.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ControlAlign property is set to a value that is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ControlAlign está definida como um valor que não é um do <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultSize property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the control when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: DefaultSize propriedade representa o <xref:System.Drawing.Size>do controle quando ele é criado inicialmente.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> is `true`, the control is sized automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> orientation.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>é `true`, o controle é dimensionado automaticamente de acordo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>orientação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manually adjust the size of the control by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode ajustar manualmente o tamanho do controle definindo seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>valor da propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para manter o melhor desempenho, você não deve definir o <xref:System.Drawing.Size>de um controle em seu construtor.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the DefaultSize property.
trans-unit.target: O método preferencial é substituir a propriedade DefaultSize.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The display style of the object.
trans-unit.target: O estilo de exibição do objeto.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if double clicking is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver habilitado clicando duas vezes; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o pai de controle do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle pai do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> estiver habilitada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hosted control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle hospedado é inserido.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gives the focus to a control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o foco para um controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle tem foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle tem foco; de entrada Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font to be used on the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte a ser usada no controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> for the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para o controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the foreground color of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de primeiro plano do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um controle pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área tamanho personalizado para um controle.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma imagem em um ToolStripItem é automaticamente redimensionada para caber em um contêiner; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnBoundsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBoundsChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Enter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Enter"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo item; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere tiver sido processado como um mnemônico pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
